channel.title: ReaderRJ tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from ReaderRJ.

item.description: . @Tesco Stop Replacing People by Machines #BringBackTescoStaff - Sign the Petition! https://t.co/eSfqfF5bV9 via @UKChange
item.source:markdown: . @Tesco Stop Replacing People by Machines #BringBackTescoStaff - Sign the Petition! https://t.co/eSfqfF5bV9 via @UKChange

item.description: @mrjamesob Just waiting for the ones from @pritipatel , @nadhimzahawi , @sajidjavid as well
item.source:markdown: @mrjamesob Just waiting for the ones from @pritipatel , @nadhimzahawi , @sajidjavid as well

item.description: I’m asking you as my MP @nadhimzahawi in you new role of Treasurer to give Health and Education the money they so desperately need https://t.co/gCNNeCN8b3
item.source:markdown: I’m asking you as my MP @nadhimzahawi in you new role of Treasurer to give Health and Education the money they so desperately need https://t.co/gCNNeCN8b3

item.description: I've just signed the petition calling on @Conservatives to stop @BorisJohnson from continuing on as Prime Minister, he should no longer be in charge of the country. Boris Johnson must go, now. Please sign and share #LeaveMeansLeave https://t.co/kUXk3Crchr via @38_degrees
item.source:markdown:
I've just signed the petition calling on @Conservatives to stop @BorisJohnson from continuing on as Prime Minister, he should no longer be in charge of the country. Boris Johnson must go, now. Please sign and share #LeaveMeansLeave
https://t.co/kUXk3Crchr via @38_degrees

item.description: Boris Johnson: Don't scrap free covid testing and isolation! - Sign the Petition! https://t.co/vGb9BtsL14 via @UKChange
item.source:markdown: Boris Johnson: Don't scrap free covid testing and isolation! - Sign the Petition! https://t.co/vGb9BtsL14 via @UKChange

item.description: Young feminist and LGBT+ activist, Yulja Tsvetkova, was charged with violating the Russian "gay propaganda" law for drawing a rainbow family. Help her fight back. https://t.co/57JLQZOHOC
item.source:markdown: Young feminist and LGBT+ activist, Yulja Tsvetkova, was charged with violating the Russian "gay propaganda" law for drawing a rainbow family. Help her fight back. https://t.co/57JLQZOHOC

item.description: @edwinhayward Don’t forget this as well https://t.co/hYD7cIE1oZ I believe that it later turned out that he had attended before. Unfortunately he’s my MP.
item.source:markdown: @edwinhayward Don’t forget this as well https://t.co/hYD7cIE1oZ I believe that it later turned out that he had attended before. Unfortunately he’s my MP.

item.description: Sorry to break it to you, Dominic Raab – but Boris Johnson is NOT your friend https://t.co/4f3toMGf5N

item.description: I just signed the petition calling on @borisjohnson to not nominate and elevate Paul Dacre to the House of Lords. Can you sign too? https://t.co/VdpU67vwXQ via @38_degrees
